content.p: Starting a new job is exciting, and from our experience we know that a successful induction can make a big difference. Our induction process welcomes new recruits and helps them adjust to their role at the University. Our induction process gives new staff all the information they need about working here. They also have the opportunity to join us at a welcome event. If you’re new to the University, we’ll introduce you to the training and development opportunities we offer. We’ll also provide useful contacts and practical advice on our systems. A-Z of services A-Z of policies Forms
